summary: The customer is looking to purchase a Contoso Wireless TV and was considering using a credit card. The agent informed the customer that they can receive an instant 10% discount off the purchase price if they use a credit card and also have the option of 3-month interest free financing if they qualify. To qualify, they must have a minimum credit score of 650 or higher, have an active bank account in good standing, and make regular payments on time for the duration of the loan period.
